data.name: Enderal - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The original score from the award winning role-playing adventure Enderal: The Shards of Order.

Composers: Marvin Kopp, Andreas Makusev, Simon Autenrieth, Sebastian Loebbers, Nicolas Lietzau, Philipp Kapusta

Also check out the OST for Forgotten Stories.

Tracks: 118
Audio file format: FLAC
Overall runtime: 5h 13m
Download size: 1,60 GB
Download location: \Enderal\DLC\Enderal - OST\

Tracklist
